body: I swear to god, every Nexus game I go to, there is at least one hacker. The one I was just in had two people using God Mode and Forcefield. Seriously, get more moderators in the Nexus games. That is where the big hacks.
body_tagged: I swear to god, every Nexus game I go to, there is at least one hacker. The one I was just in had two people using God Mode and Forcefield. Seriously, get more moderators in the Nexus games. That is where the big hacks.
title: The hackers...

replies.body: Well, ./report, or ./leave and record yourself. I do that, more efficient than having more moderators in the Nexus games. I'd rather have a even spread out number than all focus'd on one gm.
replies.body_tagged: Well, ./report, or ./leave and record yourself. I do that, more efficient than having more moderators in the Nexus games. I'd rather have a even spread out number than all focus'd on one gm.

replies.body: Don't worry, I recorded the both, theye are uploaded and reported on forums :)
replies.body_tagged: Don't worry, I recorded the both, theye are uploaded and reported on forums :)

replies.body: It's funny how no one ever comes when I do /report. Plus, I don't have a video recorder, and my computer probs couldn't handle it anyway.
replies.body_tagged: It's funny how no one ever comes when I do /report. Plus, I don't have a video recorder, and my computer probs couldn't handle it anyway.

replies.body: You don't see them because when you are in game, you do t see the players that are just spectating and they don't appear when you do the tab thing. You have to do /who and then you will see everyone that is on that game server.
replies.body_tagged: You don't see them because when you are in game, you do t see the players that are just spectating and they don't appear when you do the tab thing. You have to do /who and then you will see everyone that is on that game server.

replies.body: God Mode doesn't exist on Avicus, it's been patched for a very long time. I kind of feel that you are a bit butthurt because you were just killed.
replies.body_tagged: God Mode doesn't exist on Avicus, it's been patched for a very long time. I kind of feel that you are a bit butthurt because you were just killed.

replies.body: Para, ive seen some players use regen, all of their armor broke and they were still getting hit from 4+ people. So REGEN works, but not God.
replies.body_tagged: Para, ive seen some players use regen, all of their armor broke and they were still getting hit from 4+ people. So REGEN works, but not God.

replies.body:
There ain't no God mode :P

And a Moderator's work is hard.. I personally have a few mock exams this week in prep for next year, I want to make sure my revision is up to schedule, so when I do come on, it's for maybe 10-15 minutes at a time as a break. 

The best way for YOU to make a difference is to file an on line report with clear and sufficient evidence, that way we can ban them easier,

replies.body:
Glitchy, you're wrong. Sorry.

I've toyed with many clients and I can't find working regen that works in Multiplayer as of late. See wizardhax site and try finding one yourself.

replies.body: Then prepare to wear glasses, because it will be the blurriest resolution possible in human mankind.
